name: Rayvolution
description:
Weave through different attacks and take down predators that are trying to hunt you in this underwater themed bullet hell boss rush!

Note: There are some known issues with the web version on Linux in Firefox. Please try the downloadable version for now.

Controls:

  • Swap: Left mouse button / enter key / A button 
  • Boost: Hold left mouse button / space bar / right trigger
Credits:
  • Programming and art by kcaze.
  • Music and sound effects by shake onigiri.
  • Bullet sound effects from Kenney's impact sounds pack.
